original: manorathān saphalīkartum asamarthetyanena manorathāḥ sarve 'syā hṛdi tiṣṭanti iti pratīteḥ svaśabdena manorathapadena sāmānyākāreṇa tādṛśecchāyā  #

original: na ca manorathapadena manorathatvākāreṇā sāmānyecchāyā abhidhāne 'pi cumbeyam iti viṣayaviśeṣaviśiṣṭecchātvena vyaṅgyatve kiṃ bādhakam iti

original: na hi viśeṣākāreṇa vyaṅgyo 'pi sāmānyākāreṇābhihito 'rthaḥ sahṛdayānāṃ camatkṛtim utpādayitum īṣṭe/

original: na ca daramīlannayanātvaviśiṣṭanirīkṣaṇaṃ vidheyam iti nānuvādyatāvacchedakatvaṃ tasyā iti vācyam/

original: evam api nayanagatadaramīlanasya tatkāryatve 'pi daramīlannayanātvaviśiṣṭanirīkṣaṇasya ratimātrakāryatvāt/

original: “taṭādighaṭitā vākyārthāḥ snānavyāvṛttidvārā saṃbhogāṅgānām āśleṣacumbanādīnāṃ pratipādanena pradhānavyaṅgyavyañjane sāhāyakam ācaranti iti,

analyzed: evam tvarayā samyak a kṣālanena uttara uṣṭhaḥ na nirmṛṣṭa rāgaḥ dharaḥ tu tad apekṣayā gaṇḍūṣa jala radana śodhana aṅguli ādīnām adhika saṃmardam āvahati iti

īrṣyā nirbhara phulla roma nikara vyāvalgat ūdhaḥ sravat
pīyūṣa prakaraiḥ sura indra surabhiḥ prāvṛṭpayodāyate
atra indra sabhā madhya gata sakala nirīkṣaka ālambanaḥ avani maṇḍala āgata viṣaya vandi indra vadana vinirgata rāja dāna varṇanā uddīpitaḥ
ūdhaḥ prasnuta pīyūṣa prakaraiḥ anubhāvitaḥ

original: asūyādibhiḥ saṃcāribhiḥ paripoṣito 'pi kāmagavīgata utsāho rājastutiguṇībhūta iti na rasavyapadeśahetuḥ/
analyzed: asūyā ādibhiḥ saṃcāribhiḥ kāma gavī gataḥ utsāhaḥ rāja stuti guṇībhūtaḥ iti na rasa vyapadeśa hetuḥ
atas eva idam api na udāharaṇam

ālambana gata ārādhya tvasya anubhāva gata mithyātvasya ca pratītyā rasa an ullāsa āpatteḥ

original: na ca sādhāraṇīkaraṇād ārādhyatvajñānānutpattir iti vācyam/
analyzed: na ca sādhāraṇīkaraṇāt ārādhya tva jñāna anutpattiḥ iti vācyam

original: yatra sahṛdayānāṃ rasodbodhaḥ pramāṇasiddhas tatraiva sādhāraṇīkaraṇasya kalpanāt/
analyzed: yatra sahṛdayānām rasa udbodhaḥ pramāṇa siddhaḥ tatra eva sādhāraṇīkaraṇasya kalpanāt
anyathā sva mātṛ viṣayaka sva pitṛ rati varṇane sahṛdayasya rasa udbodha āpatteḥ

original: jayadevādibhis tu gītagovindādiprabandheṣu sakalasahṛdayasaṃmato'yaṃ samayo madonmattamataṅgajair iva bhinna iti ca tannidarśanenedānīṃtanena  #
analyzed: jayadeva ādibhiḥ tu gīta govinda ādi prabandheṣu sakala sahṛdaya saṃmataḥ iyam samayaḥ mada unmatta mataṅga jaiḥ iva bhinnaḥ iti ca tad nidarśanena idānīṃtanena
tathā varṇayitum sāṃpratam

original: tathā vidyāvayovarṇāśramatapobhir utkṛṣṭaiḥ svato 'pakṛṣṭeṣu na sabahumānena vacasā vyavahartavyam/
analyzed: tathā vidyā vayaḥ varṇa āśrama tapobhiḥ utkṛṣṭaiḥ svatas upakṛṣṭeṣu na sa bahu mānena vacasā vyavahartavyam
vyavahartavyam ca apakṛṣṭaiḥ utkṛṣṭeṣu

original: tatrāpi tatrabhavan bhagavann ityādibhiḥ saṃbodhanair munigurudevatāprabhṛtaya eva na rājādayaḥ,
analyzed: tatra api tatrabhavan bhagavan ityādibhiḥ saṃbodhanaiḥ muni guru devatā prabhṛtayaḥ eva na rāja ādayaḥ

na adhamaiḥ śūdra ādibhiḥ

analyzed: su alpam jalpa bṛhaspate jaḍa mate nā eṣā sabhā vajriṇaḥ

original: vīṇāṃ saṃhara nārada stutikathālāpair alaṃ tumburo
analyzed: vīṇām saṃhara nārada stuti kathā ālāpaiḥ alam tumburo

original: iti kasyacin nāṭakasya padye vipralambhaśṛṅgārāṅgībhūtavīrarasākṣepakaparamaiśvaryaparipoṣakatayā sthitadauvārikavacanasya brahmādyadhikṣepaparasyānaucityaṃ  #

na doṣaḥ

original: evam eva “ale le saddaḥsamuppāḍia hariyakusaggaṃthimayācchamālāpai vittivissambhia bālavihavaṃdaḥkaaṇā bamhaṇā” ity ādividūṣakavacane 'pi reśabdādiprayogasya
analyzed: evam eva ale le saddaḥ samuppāḍia vitti vissambhia bāla viha vaṃdaḥ kaaṇā bamhaṇā iti ādi vidūṣaka vacane pi re śabda ādi prayogasya

eṣā hi diś upadarśitā
anayā sudhībhiḥ anyat api ūhyam

original: raseṣu caiteṣu nigaditeṣu mādhuryaujaḥprasādākhyāṃs trīn guṇān āhuḥ/

original: saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt karuṇaśāntayos tābhyām api vipralambhe” ity apare/
analyzed: saṃyoga śṛṅgārāt karuṇa śāntayoḥ tābhyām api vipralambhe iti apare

original: saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt karuṇavipralambhaśānteṣv atiśayitam eva na punas tatrāpi tāratamyam” ity anye/
analyzed: saṃyoga śṛṅgārāt karuṇa vipralambha śānteṣu atiśayitam eva na punar tatra api tāratamyam iti anye

original: tatra prathamacaramayor matayoḥ “karuṇe vipralambhe tacchānte cātiśayānvitam” iti prācāṃ sūtram anukūlam/
analyzed: tatra prathama caramayoḥ matayoḥ karuṇe vipralambhe tat śānte ca atiśaya anvitam iti prācām sūtram anukūlam
tasya uttara sūtra gatasya krameṇa iti padasya apakarṣa anapakarṣābhyām vyākhyā dvayasya saṃbhavāt

original: madhyasthe tu mate karuṇaśāntābhyāṃ vipralambhasya mādhuryātiśaye yadi sahṛdayānām anubhavo 'sti sākṣī tadā sa pramāṇam/

vīra bībhatsa raudreṣu ojasaḥ yathottaram atiśayaḥ
uttarottaram atiśayitāyāḥ citta dīpteḥ jananāt
adbhuta hāsya bhayānakānām guṇa dvaya yogi tvam kecid icchanti
apare tu prasāda mātram

original: prasādas tu sarveṣu raseṣu sarvāsu racanāsu ca sādhāraṇaḥ/
analyzed: prasādaḥ tu sarveṣu raseṣu sarvāsu racanāsu ca sādhāraṇaḥ

original: guṇānāṃ caiṣāṃ drutidīptivikāsākhyās tisraś cittavṛttayaḥ krameṇa prayojyāḥ/
analyzed: guṇānām ca eṣām druti dīpti vikāsa ākhyāḥ tisraḥ citta vṛttayaḥ krameṇa prayojyāḥ
tad tad guṇa viśiṣṭa rasa carvaṇā janyāḥ iti yāvat
evam eteṣu guṇeṣu rasa mātra dharmeṣu
vyavasiteṣu madhurā racanā

original: ojasvī bandha ity ādayo vyavahārā ākāro 'sya śūra ity ādivyavahāravad aupacārikā iti mammaṭabhaṭṭādayaḥ/
analyzed: ojasvī bandhaḥ iti ādayaḥ vyavahārāḥ ākāraḥ sya śūraḥ iti ādi vyavahāra vat aupacārikāḥ iti mammaṭa bhaṭṭa ādayaḥ

original: ye 'mī mādhuryaujaḥ prasādārasamātradharmatayoktās teṣāṃ rasadharmatve kiṃ mānam?
analyzed: ye mī mādhurya ojaḥ prasādāḥ rasa mātra dharmatayā uktāḥ teṣām rasa dharma tve kim mānam
pratyakṣam eva iti ced na

original: dāhādeḥ kāryād analagatasyoṣṇasparśasya yathā bhinnatayānubhavas tathā drutyādicittavṛttibhyo rasakāryebhyo 'nyeṣāṃ rasagataguṇānām ananubhavāt/
analyzed: dāha ādeḥ kāryāt anala gatasya uṣṇa sparśasya yathā bhinna tayā anubhavaḥ tathā druti ādi cittavṛttibhyaḥ rasa kāryebhyaḥ nyeṣām rasa gata guṇānām ananubhavāt

original: tādṛśaguṇaviśiṣṭarasānāṃ drutyādikāraṇatvāt kāraṇatāvacchedakatayā guṇānām anumānam iti cet,
analyzed: tādṛśa guṇa viśiṣṭa rasānām druti ādi kāraṇa tvāt kāraṇa tā avacchedaka tayā guṇānām anumānam iti ced
prātisvika rūpeṇa eva rasānām kāraṇa tā upapattau guṇa kalpane gauravāt
śṛṅgāra karuṇa śāntānām mādhuryavat tvena druti kāraṇa tvam

original: prātisvikarūpeṇa kāraṇatvakalpanāpekṣayā laghubhūtam iti tu na vācyam/ pareṇa
analyzed: prātisvika rūpeṇa kāraṇatva kalpanā apekṣayā laghu bhūtam iti tu na vācyam pareṇa

original: madhuratarādiguṇānāṃ pṛthag drutataratvādi kāryatāratamyaprayojakatayābhyupagamena mādhuryavattvena kāraṇatāyā gaḍubhūtatvāt/
analyzed: madhuratara ādi guṇānām pṛthak drutatara tva ādi kārya tāratamya prayojaka tayā abhyupagamena mādhuryavat tvena kāraṇatāyāḥ gaḍu bhūta tvāt
ittham ca prātisvika rūpeṇa eva kāraṇa tve lāghavam
kim ca ātmanaḥ nirguṇa tayā ātma rūpa rasa guṇa tvam mādhurya ādīnām anupapannam
evam tad upādhi rati ādi guṇa tvam api
māna abhāvāt

original: atha śṛṅgāro madhura ity ādivyavahāraḥ katham iti cet,
analyzed: atha śṛṅgāraḥ madhuraḥ iti ādi vyavahāraḥ katham iti ced
evam tarhi druti ādi cittavṛtti prayojaka tvam

original: prayojakatāsaṃbandhena drutyādikam eva vā mādhuryādikam astu/
analyzed: prayojaka tā saṃbandhena druti ādikam eva vā mādhurya ādikam astu
vyavahāraḥ tu vājigandhā uṣṇa iti vyavahāra vat akṣataḥ
prayojaka tvam ca adṛṣṭa ādi vilakṣaṇam śabda artha rasa racanā gatam eva grāhyam
atas na vyavahāra atiprasaktiḥ

original: tathā ca śabdārthayor api mādhuryāder īdṛśasya sattvād upacāro naiva kalpya iti tu mādṛśāḥ/
analyzed: tathā ca śabda arthayoḥ api mādhurya ādeḥ īdṛśasya sattvāt upacāraḥ nā eva kalpyaḥ iti tu mādṛśāḥ
jarattarāḥ tu
śleṣaḥ prasādaḥ samatā mādhuryam sukumāratā

iti daśā śabda guṇān
daśa eva ca artha guṇān āmananti
nāmāni punar tāni eva
lakṣaṇam tu bhinnam
tathā hi

original: śabdānāṃ bhinnānām apy ekatvapratibhānaprayojakaḥ saṃhitayaikajātīyavarṇavinyāsaviśeṣo gāḍhatvāparaparyāyaḥ śleṣaḥ//
analyzed: śabdānām bhinnānām api eka tva pratibhāna prayojakaḥ saṃhitayā eka jātīya varṇa vinyāsa viśeṣaḥ gāḍha tva apara paryāyaḥ śleṣaḥ
yat āhuḥ śliṣṭam aspaṣṭa śaithilyam iti
yathā anavarata vidvat druma drohi dāridrya mādyat dvipa uddāma darpa ogha vidrāvaṇa prauḍha pañcānanaḥ iti
gāḍha tva śaithilyābhyām vyutkrameṇa miśraṇam bandhasya prasādaḥ
yathā
kim brūmaḥ tava vīra tām vayam amī
yasmin dharā khaṇḍala
krīḍā kuṇḍalita bhru śoṇa nayane dos maṇḍalam paśyasi
māṇikya āvali kānti danturataraiḥ bhūṣā sahastra utsaraiḥ
vindhya araṇya guhā gṛha avaniruhāḥ tad kālam ullāsitāḥ
atra yasmin ityantam śaithilyam
bhru śabda antam gāḍha tvam
punar nayana iti antam prathamam ityādi bodhyam
yathā vakṣyamāṇa mādhurya udāharaṇe
tatra hi upanāgarikayā eva upakrama saṃhārau
saṃyoga para hrasva atirikta varṇa ghaṭita tve sati pṛthak pada tvam mādhuryam
yathā
nitarām paruṣā saroja mālā na mṛṇālāni vicāra peśalāni

original: yadi komalatā tavāṅgakānām atha kā nāma kathāpi pallavānām//“
analyzed: yadi komala tā tava aṅgakānām atha kā nāma kathā api pallavānām
yathā

original: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kāpi ramyā daśā manasi me madirekṣaṇāyāḥ//“
analyzed: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kā api ramyā daśā manasi me madirā īkṣaṇāyāḥ
atra pūrva ardhe
uttara ardhe tu mādhuryam api
jha c iti pratīyamāna artha anvayaka tvam artha vyaktiḥ
yathā nitarām ityādau
kaṭhina varṇa ghaṭanā rūpa vikaṭa tva lakṣaṇa udāra tā
yathā
vinodini vināyake ḍamaru ḍiṇḍima dhvānini

haṭha uddhata jaṭā udbhaṭaḥ gata paṭaḥ naṭaḥ nṛtyati
padānām nṛtyat prāya tvam vikaṭa tā iti kāvyaprakāśa ṭīkākārāḥ vyācakṣate

original: udāharanti ca “svacaraṇaviniviṣṭair nūpurair nartakīnāṃ jhaṭiti raṇitam āsīt” ityādi/
analyzed: udāharanti ca sva caraṇa viniviṣṭaiḥ nūpuraiḥ nartakīnām jhaṭiti raṇitam āsīt ityādi

original: tatra teṣām etādṛśīṃ vikaṭatvalakṣaṇām udāratām ojasy
analyzed: tatra teṣām etādṛśīm vikaṭa tva lakṣaṇām udāra tām ojasi

original: antarbhāvayan kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ katham anukūla iti ta eva jānanti/
analyzed: antarbhāvayan kāvyaprakāśa kāraḥ katham anukūlaḥ iti te eva jānanti

original: na hy atraujaso vaipulyena pratibhānam asti/
analyzed: na hi atra ojasaḥ vaipulyena pratibhānam asti

original: “viniviṣṭair nūpurair narta-” ity atra sannapy ojaso lavo na camatkārī/
analyzed: viniviṣṭaiḥ nūpuraiḥ nartaḥ iti atra san api ojasaḥ lavaḥ na camatkārī

original: nāpi tatra nṛtyatprāyatvaṃ varṇānām anubhavanti sahṛdayāḥ/
analyzed: nā api tatra nṛtyat prāya tvam varṇānām anubhavanti sahṛdayāḥ
aṃśa antare tu mādhuryam eva
saṃyoga para hrasva prācurya rūpam gāḍha tvam ojaḥ
yathā
sa ahaṃkāra sura asura āvali kara ākṛṣṭa bhramat mandara
tṛṣṇā tāmya damanda tāpasa kulaiḥ sa ānandam ālokitā
bhūmībhūṣaṇa bhūṣayanti bhū vana ābhogam bhavat kīrtayaḥ

original: yathā vā “ayaṃ patatu nirdayam” ityādiprāg udāhṛte/
analyzed: yathā vā ayam patatu nirdayam ityādi prāk udāhṛte

original: avidagdhavaidikādiprayogayogyānāṃ padānāṃ parihāreṇa prayujyamāneṣu padeṣu lokottaraśobhārūpam aujjvalyaṃ kāntiḥ//
analyzed: avidagdha vaidika ādi prayoga yogyānām padānām parihāreṇa prayujyamāneṣu padeṣu lokottara śobhā rūpam aujjvalyam kāntiḥ
yathā nitarām ityādi prāk udāhṛte
anayoḥ eva prācīnaiḥ āroha avaroha vyapadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: krama eva hi tayoḥ prasādād asya bhedakaḥ/
analyzed: kramaḥ eva hi tayoḥ prasādāt asya bhedakaḥ
tatra hi tayoḥ vyutkrameṇa vṛtteḥ
yathā
svarga nirgata nirargala gaṅgā tuṅgu bhaṅgura taraṅga sakhānām
kevala amṛta mucām vacanānām yasya lāsya gṛham āsya sarojam
atra ārohaḥ prathame rdhe
tṛtīya caraṇe tu avarohaḥ

original: gaṅgety ādau mādhuryasya vyañjakeṣu varṇeṣu satsv api dīrghasamāsāntaḥpātitayāna tasya prarohaḥ/
analyzed: gaṅgā iti ādau mādhuryasya vyañjakeṣu varṇeṣu satsu api tasya prarohaḥ
uttara ardhe tu saḥ pi
ete daśa śabda guṇāḥ

original: evaṃ kriyāparamparayā vidagdhaceṣṭitasya tadasphuṭatvasya tadupapādakayukteś ca sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpaḥ saṃsargaḥ śleṣaḥ//
analyzed: evam kriyā paramparayā vidagdha ceṣṭitasya tad asphuṭa tvasya tad upapādaka yukteḥ ca sāmānādhikaraṇya rūpaḥ saṃsargaḥ śleṣaḥ
yāvat arthaka pada tva rūpam artha vaimalyam prasādaḥ
yathā kamala anukāri vadanam kila tasyāḥ ityādi
pratyudāharaṇam tu kamala kānti anukāri vaktram ityādi
yathā
hariḥ pitā hariḥ mātā hariḥ bhrātā hariḥ suhṛd

original: hariṃ sarvatra paśyāmi harer anyan na bhāti me//“
analyzed: harim sarvatra paśyāmi hareḥ anyat na bhāti me

original: atra viṣṇur bhrātety ādinirmāṇe prakramabhaṅgātmakaṃ vaiṣamyam/
analyzed: atra viṣṇuḥ bhrātā iti ādi nirmāṇe prakrama bhaṅga ātmakam vaiṣamyam

original: ekasyā evokter bhaṅgyantareṇa punaḥ kathanātmakam uktivaicitryaṃ mādhuryam//
analyzed: ekasyāḥ eva ukteḥ bhaṅgī antareṇa punar kathana ātmakam ukti vaicitryam mādhuryam
yathā
vidhattām niḥśaṅkam niravadhi samādhim vidhiḥ aho

original: sukhaṃ śeṣe śetāṃ harir avīrataṃ nṛtyatu haraḥ/
analyzed: sukham śeṣe śetām hariḥ avīratam nṛtyatu haraḥ
kṛtam prāyaścittaiḥ alam atha tapaḥ dāna yajanaiḥ

original: savitrī kāmānāṃ yadi jagati jāgarti bhavatī//“
analyzed: savitrī kāmānām yadi jagati jāgarti bhavatī

original: atra vidhyādibhir nāsti kim api prayojanam ity eṣo 'rthaḥ samādhividhānādipreraṇārūpeṇoktivaicitryeṇābhihitaḥ/
analyzed: atra vidhi ādibhiḥ na asti kim api prayojanam iti eṣaḥ rthaḥ samādhi vidhāna ādi preraṇā rūpeṇa ukti vaicitryeṇa abhihitaḥ
anyathā anavīkṛta tva āpatteḥ
akāṇḍe śoka dāyi tva abhāva rūpam apāruṣyam sukumāra tā
yathā tvarayā yāti pānthaḥ yam priyā viraha kātaraḥ

original: “priyāmaraṇakātaraḥ” ity atra tu śokadāyino maraṇaśabdasya sattvāt pāruṣyam/
analyzed: priyā maraṇa kātaraḥ iti atra tu śoka dāyinaḥ maraṇa śabdasya sattvāt pāruṣyam
idam ca aślīla tā doṣa vyāpyam
vastunaḥ varṇanīyasya asādhāraṇa kriyā rūpayoḥ varṇanam artha vyaktiḥ
yathā
guru madhye kamala akṣī kamalākṣeṇa prahartu kāmam mām
rada yantrita rasanā agram taralita nayanam nivārayāṃcakre
ayam eva idānīṃtanaiḥ svabhāvoktyalaṃkāraḥ iti vyapadiśyate

original: “cumbanaṃ dehi me bhārye kāmacāṇḍālatṛptaye” ity ādigrāmyārthaparihāra udāratā//
analyzed: cumbanam dehi me bhārye kāma cāṇḍāla tṛptaye iti ādi grāmya artha parihāraḥ udāra tā
ekasya padārthasya bahubhiḥ padaiḥ abhidhānam
bahūnām ca ekena
tathā ekasya vākya arthasya bahubhiḥ vākyaiḥ
bahuvākyā arthasya eka vākyena abhidhānam
viśeṣaṇānām sa abhiprāya tvam ca iti pañcavidham ojaḥ

original: itthaṃ cānucitavibhāvālambanāyā bahunāyakaviṣayāyā anubhayaniṣṭhāyāś ca saṃgraha iti/

original: asyāś ca cirāya tasminn āsaktāyā antaḥpure parapuruṣāgamanasyātyantam asaṃbhāvanayā ka eṣa māṃ bodhayatīty ādāv ucita eva trāsaḥ/

original: anantaraṃ ca paricayābhivyaktyā so 'yaṃ matpriyo madarthaṃ prāṇān api tṛṇīkṛtyāgata iti jñānād utpannaṃ harṣam abhivyañjayat smeravadanām iti  #

original: tasmād bhāvapraśamādiṣv api prādhānyena bhāvānām eva camatkāritvam,
analyzed: tasmāt bhāva praśama ādiṣu api prādhānyena bhāvānām eva camatkāri tvam

original: praśamādes tūpasarjanatvam ato na tasya vācyatādoṣaḥ/
analyzed: praśama ādeḥ tu upasarjana tvam atas na tasya vācya tā doṣaḥ

original: idaṃ punar bhāvadhvanibhyo bhāvaśāntyādidhvanīnāṃ camatkāravailakṣaṇye nidānam-- yad ekatra carvaṇāyāṃ bhāveṣu sthityavacchinnāmarṣāditvam,
analyzed: idam punar bhāva dhvanibhyaḥ bhāva śānti ādi dhvanīnām camatkāra vailakṣaṇye nidānam yat ekatra carvaṇāyām bhāveṣu sthiti avacchinna amarṣa ādi tvam
amarṣa ādi tvam eva vā prakāraḥ
anyatra tu praśama avastha tva ādiḥ api iti
rasasya tu sthāyi mūlaka tvāt praśama ādeḥ asaṃbhavaḥ
saṃbhave vā na camatkāraḥ
iti na sa vicāryate

original: so 'yaṃ nigaditaḥ sarvo 'pi ratyādilakṣaṇo vyaṅgyaprapañcaḥ sphuṭe prakaraṇe jhagiti
analyzed: saḥ yam nigaditaḥ rati ādi lakṣaṇaḥ vyaṅgya prapañcaḥ sphuṭe prakaraṇe

original: pratiteṣu vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṣu sahṛdayatamena pramātrā sūkṣmeṇaiva samayeta
analyzed: pratiteṣu vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāriṣu sahṛdayatamena pramātrā sūkṣmeṇa eva

original: pratīyata iti hetuhetumatoḥ paurvāparyakramasyālakṣaṇād alakṣyakramo vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: pratīyate iti hetu hetumatoḥ paurvāparya kramasya alakṣaṇāt alakṣya kramaḥ vyapadiśyate
yatra tu vicāra vedyam prakaraṇam

original: unneyā vā vibhāvādayas tatra sāmagrīvilambādhīnaṃ camatkṛter māntharyam iti saṃlakṣyakramo 'py eṣa bhavati/
analyzed: unneyāḥ vā vibhāva ādayaḥ tatra sāmagrī vilamba adhīnam camatkṛteḥ māntharyam iti eṣa bhavati

original: yathā-- “talpagatāpi ca sutanuḥ” iti prāg udāhṛte padye “saṃprati” ity etadarthāvagatir vilambena/
analyzed: yathā talpa gatā api ca su tanuḥ iti prāk udāhṛte padye saṃprati iti etad artha avagatiḥ vilambena
na khalu dharmi grāhaka māna siddham rati ādi dhvaneḥ alakṣya krama vyaṅgya tvam
atas eva lakṣya krama prasaṅge
evaṃvādini devarṣau pārśve pituḥ adhomukhī
līlā kamala patrāṇi gaṇayāmāsa pārvatī
iti atra
kumārī svābhāvyāt api adhomukha tva viśiṣṭasya līlā kamala pattra gaṇanasya upapattyā manāk vilambena
nārada kṛta vivāha ādi prasaṅga vijñāna uttaram vrīḍāyāḥ camatkaraṇāt lakṣya kramaḥ yam dhvaniḥ
iti prāhuḥ ānandavardhana ācāryāḥ

original: rasabhāvādir artho dhvanyamāna eva, na vācyaḥ/
analyzed: rasa bhāva ādiḥ arthaḥ dhvanyamānaḥ eva na vācyaḥ

original: tathāpi na sarvo 'lakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ” iti cābhinavaguptapādācāryāḥ/
analyzed: tathā api na sarvaḥ lakṣya kramasya viṣayaḥ iti ca abhinavagupta pāda ācāryāḥ

original: syād etat, yady ayaṃ rasādiḥ saṃlakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ syāt/
analyzed: syāt etat yadi ayam rasa ādiḥ saṃlakṣya kramasya viṣayaḥ syāt
anuraṇana bheda gaṇana prastāve artha śakti mūlasya dvādaśa bhedāḥ iti abhinavagupta uktiḥ

original: “tenāyaṃ dvādaśātmakaḥ” iti mammaṭoktiś ca na saṃgaccheta,
analyzed: tena ayam dvādaśa ātmakaḥ iti mammaṭa uktiḥ ca na saṃgaccheta
vastu alaṃkāra ātmanā dvividhena vācyena svataḥsaṃbhavi tva kavi prauḍha ukti niṣpanna tva kavi nibaddha vaktṛ prauḍha ukti niṣpanna tvaiḥ

original: tribhir upādhibhis traividhyam āpannena ṣaḍātmanā vastvalaṃkārayor iva rasāder apy
analyzed: tribhiḥ upādhibhiḥ traividhyam āpannena ṣaṣ ātmanā vastu alaṃkārayoḥ iva rasa ādeḥ api
abhivyañjanāt aṣṭādaśa tva prasaṅgāt

original: atrocyate-- prakaṭair vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhir alakṣyakramatayaiva vyajyamāno ratyādiḥ sthāyibhāvo rasībhavati,
analyzed: atrā ucyate prakaṭaiḥ vibhāva anubhāva vyabhicāribhiḥ alakṣya krama tayā eva vyajyamānaḥ rati ādiḥ sthāyibhāvaḥ rasībhavati
na saṃlakṣya krama tayā
rasībhāvaḥ hi nāma jha giti jāyamāna alaukika camatkāra viṣaya sthāyi tvam
saṃlakṣya krama tayā vyajyamānasya rati ādeḥ tu vastu mātra tā eva

original: na rasāditvam iti teṣām āśayasya varṇanena na taduktīnāṃ virodhaḥ/
analyzed: na rasa ādi tvam iti teṣām āśayasya varṇanena na tad uktīnām virodhaḥ
upapattiḥ tu arthe smin vicāraṇīyā

original: rasabhāvādir artha ity atra rasādiśabdo ratyādiparaḥ/
analyzed: rasa bhāva ādiḥ arthaḥ iti atra rasa ādi śabdaḥ rati ādi paraḥ

original: taditthaṃ nirūpitasyāsya rasādidhvaniprapañcasya padavarṇaracanāvākyaprabandhaiḥ padaikadeśair avarṇātmakai rāgādibhiś cābhivyaktim āmananti/
analyzed: tat ittham nirūpitasya asya rasa ādi dhvani prapañcasya pada varṇa racanā vākya prabandhaiḥ pada eka deśaiḥ avarṇa ātmakaiḥ rāga ādibhiḥ ca abhivyaktim āmananti

original: tatra vākyagatānāṃ padānāṃ sarveṣām api svārthopasthitidvārā vākyārthajñānopāyatve samāne 'pi kurvadrūpatayā camatkārāyogavyavacchinnatvena  #
analyzed: tatra vākya gatānām padānām sarveṣām api svārtha upasthiti dvārā vākya artha jñāna upāya tve samāne pi kurvat rūpa tayā camatkāra ayoga vyavacchinna tvena
kasyacid eva dhvani vyapadeśa hetu tvam

original: yathā “mandam ākṣipati” ity atra mandam ity asya/
analyzed: yathā mandam ākṣipati iti atra mandam iti asya

original: racanāvarṇānāṃ tu padavākyāntargatatvena vyañjakatāvacchedakakoṭipraviṣṭatvam eva na tu vyañjakatvam iti yady api suvacam,
analyzed: racanā varṇānām tu pada vākya antargata tvena vyañjaka tā avacchedaka koṭi praviṣṭa tvam eva na tu vyañjaka tvam iti yadi api suvacam
tathā api pada vākya viśiṣṭa racanā tvena

original: racanāviśiṣṭapadavākyatvena vā vyañjakatvam iti vinigamanāviraheṇa ghaṭādau daṇḍacakrādeḥ kāraṇatvasyeva pratyekam eva vyañjakatāyāḥ siddhir  #
analyzed: racanā viśiṣṭa pada vākya tvena vā vyañjaka tvam iti vinigamana aviraheṇa ghaṭa ādau daṇḍa cakra ādeḥ kāraṇa tvasya iva pratyekam eva vyañjaka tāyāḥ siddhiḥ
iti prāñcaḥ
varṇa racanā viśeṣāṇām mādhurya ādi guṇa abhivyañjaka tvam eva na rasa abhivyañjaka tvam
gauravāt māna abhāvāt ca

original: na hi guṇyabhivyañjanaṃ vinā guṇābhivyañjakatvaṃ nāstīty asti niyamaḥ,
analyzed: na hi guṇi abhivyañjanam vinā guṇa abhivyañjaka tvam nā asti iti asti niyamaḥ
indriya traye vyabhicārāt

original: itthaṃ ca svasvavyañjakopanītānāṃ guṇināṃ guṇānām udāsīnānāṃ ca yathā parasparopaśleṣeṇaudāsīnyena
analyzed: ittham ca sva sva vyañjaka upanītānām guṇinām guṇānām udāsīnānām ca yathā paraspara upaśleṣeṇa audāsīnyena

original: vā tattatpramitigocaratā tathā rasānāṃ tadguṇānāṃ cābhivyāktiviṣayateti tu navyāḥ /
analyzed: vā tad tad pramiti gocara tā tathā rasānām tad guṇānām ca abhivyākti viṣaya tā iti tu navyāḥ

original: udāharaṇaṃ tu “tāṃ tamāla” ityādi prāg uktam eva vākyasya vyañjakatāyām api “āvirbhūtā yad avadhi” ityādi ca/
analyzed: udāharaṇam tu tām tamālaḥ ityādi prāk uktam eva vākyasya vyañjaka tāyām api āvirbhūtā yat avadhi ityādi ca
prabandhasya tu yoga vāsiṣṭha rāmāyaṇe śānta karuṇayoḥ

original: ratnāvalyādīni ca śṛṅgārasya vyañjakatvān nidarśanāni prasiddhāni/
analyzed: ratnāvalī ādīni ca śṛṅgārasya vyañjaka tvāt nidarśanāni prasiddhāni
mad nirmitāḥ ca pañja laharyaḥ bhāvasya

original: padaikadeśasya ca “nikhilam idaṃ jagad aṇḍakaṃ vahāmi” iti karūpataddhito vīrarasasya prāg evodāhṛtaḥ/
analyzed: pada eka deśasya ca nikhilam idam jagat aṇḍakam vahāmi iti ka rūpa taddhitaḥ vīra rasasya prāk evā udāhṛtaḥ

original: evaṃ rāgādibhir api vyaṅgyatve sahṛdayahṛdayam eva pramāṇam/
analyzed: evam rāga ādibhiḥ api vyaṅgya tve sahṛdaya hṛdayam eva pramāṇam

original: evam eṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ prādhānyena nirūpitāny udāharaṇāni/
analyzed: evam eṣām rasa ādīnām prādhānyena nirūpitāni udāharaṇāni
guṇībhāve tu vakṣyante nāmāni ca
tatra prādhānye eva eṣām rasa ādi tvam
anyathā tu rati ādi tvam eva

original: nāmani rasapadaṃ tu ratyādiparam ity eke/
analyzed: nāmani rasa padam tu rati ādi param iti eke
asti eva rasa ādi tvam

original: kiṃ tu na dhvanivyapadeśahetutvam ity apare//
analyzed: kim tu na dhvani vyapadeśa hetu tvam iti apare
